Package lib.homies.framework.spigot.world

Class SpigotLocation

java.lang.Object
lib.homies.framework.spigot.world.SpigotLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
HomiesLocation
public class SpigotLocation extends Object implements HomiesLocation
Spigot-specific implementation of the HomiesLocation interface. This class wraps a Bukkit Location object, providing a platform-specific way to interact with locations while adhering to the platform-agnostic API.

  • Method Details

    • getLocation

      public org.bukkit.Location getLocation()
      Gets the underlying Bukkit Location object. This method allows direct access to Bukkit's location functionality when needed within the Spigot implementation module.
      Returns:
      The wrapped Bukkit Location.

    • getAs

      public <T> T getAs(Class<T> platformClass)
      Description copied from interface: HomiesLocation
      Gets the underlying platform-specific location object. This is an escape hatch to access platform-specific APIs.
      Specified by:
      getAs in interface HomiesLocation
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the platform-specific location.
      Parameters:
      platformClass - The class of the platform-specific location object (e.g., org.bukkit.Location.class).
      Returns:
      The platform-specific location object, or null if the type is incompatible.
